feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.113.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Added Beta feature: Editors can manage comments and members. (#22487) - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🐛 Fixed incorrect job status for email analytics jobs (#22465) - Steve Larson
  • 🌐 Added Hebrew support to search (#22449) - meilechh
  • 🌐 Updated Hungarian translations for Portal (#21982) - eszterik

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.112.0...v5.113.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.113.1
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed slug validation error for newly created posts without a title (#22573) - Chris Raible

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.113.0...v5.113.1

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.114.0
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed slug validation error for newly created posts without a title (#22573) - Chris Raible
  • 🌐 Updated Vietnamese translations (#22547) - Duy
  • 🌐 Updated Bulgarian translations (#22552) - Yovko Lambrev
  • 🌐 Added missing Swedish portal translation (#22458) - Julian Hessel Baranowski
  • 🌐 Update context.json (#22507) - Cathy Sarisky

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.113.1...v5.114.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.114.1
